text: EJC may refer to: * Eden Junior College, in Patna, Bihar, India * Église de Jésus-Christ, an independent Christian church in Congo * Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, an academic journal * European Jewish Congress * European Journal of Cancer, a medical journal * European Journalism Centre, a journalism institute based in the Netherlands * European Judo Championships * European Juggling Convention * European Junior Championships (disambiguation) * European Junior Cup, a motorcycling series * Exon junction complex * Eunoia Junior College, in Singapore
title: EJC
